features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Enable users to register, log in, and maintain authenticated sessions.

tasks.title: Implement Registration API
tasks.description: Create POST /api/auth/register endpoint for new user registration.
tasks.technicalNotes: Validate email and password, hash password using bcrypt, store user in in-memory store.

tasks.title: Implement Login API
tasks.description: Create POST /api/auth/login endpoint for user authentication.
tasks.technicalNotes: Verify email and password, compare hash, generate session token (JWT or in-memory), return authentication status.

tasks.title: Create Login Page
tasks.description: Build /login page for user login form.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js page at app/login/page.tsx, integrate with login API, handle error states, use shadcn/ui components.

tasks.title: User Session Management
tasks.description: Maintain authentication state across the app.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use React Context API for global auth state, persist session in-memory, protect dashboard routes.

features.name: User Profile Management
features.description: Allow users to view and update their profile information.

tasks.title: Add Profile Fields to User Entity
tasks.description: Support optional name field in user profile.
tasks.technicalNotes: Extend in-memory user store to include name, update registration and profile update logic.

tasks.title: Profile Display and Edit UI
tasks.description: Provide UI for users to view and edit their profile.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create profile section in dashboard, use shadcn/ui forms, connect to update API (if implemented).

features.name: AI Insights & Analytics
features.description: Generate and display AI-driven insights for users.

tasks.title: Define Insight Entity
tasks.description: Model the Insight entity with required fields.
tasks.technicalNotes: Fields: id, userId, content, createdAt; store in in-memory data layer.

tasks.title: Implement Insights API
tasks.description: Create GET /api/insights endpoint to fetch user-specific insights.
tasks.technicalNotes: Authenticate user, filter insights by userId, return as JSON.

tasks.title: Display Insights on Dashboard
tasks.description: Show a list of insights on the /dashboard page.
tasks.technicalNotes: Fetch insights via API, render with InsightCard component, handle loading and empty states.

tasks.title: Create InsightCard Component
tasks.description: Reusable UI component to display an individual insight.
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement in components/InsightCard.tsx, use Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for styling.

features.name: Application Layout & Navigation
features.description: Provide consistent layout and navigation across the app.

tasks.title: Implement Header Component
tasks.description: Create a header for navigation and branding.
tasks.technicalNotes: Build in components/Header.tsx, include on all main pages, use shadcn/ui for UI elements.

tasks.title: Set Up App Layout
tasks.technicalNotes: Wrap pages with layout, include Header, apply global Tailwind CSS styles.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Landing page introducing the app and guiding users to login or register.

tasks.title: Build Home Page UI
tasks.technicalNotes: Use app/page.tsx, include call-to-action buttons, brief app description, and Header.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Manage global state such as authentication status.

tasks.title: Set Up React Context API
tasks.description: Implement context for user authentication and session state.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create AuthContext, provide at app level, expose login/logout methods and user info.

features.name: Data Layer
features.description: Provide a simple in-memory store for users and insights.

tasks.title: Implement In-Memory Store
tasks.description: Create data structures for storing users and insights during runtime.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use JavaScript objects or arrays, ensure thread safety for concurrent API calls.

features.name: Styling & UI Consistency
features.description: Ensure a cohesive look and feel using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.

tasks.title: Configure Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Set up Tailwind CSS for the project.
tasks.technicalNotes: Install Tailwind, configure postcss, add to globals.css.

tasks.title: Integrate shadcn/ui
tasks.description: Use shadcn/ui components for forms, buttons, and cards.
tasks.technicalNotes: Install shadcn/ui, import components as needed, customize theme if required.

features.name: Access Control & Route Protection
features.description: Restrict access to authenticated pages (e.g., dashboard).

tasks.title: Protect Dashboard Route
tasks.description: Ensure only authenticated users can access /dashboard.
tasks.technicalNotes: Check auth state in page or layout, redirect unauthenticated users to /login.
